statements: DELETE FROM OnlinePayments WHERE user_id = 100 AND payment_status = 'Failed';
DELETE FROM OnlinePayments WHERE id = 100 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM OnlinePayments WHERE payment_status = 'Completed' AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND payment_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 500 AND user_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '4634a0ad-3b67-412b-af84-725738a2fb0b' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND amount > 100.00;
